name: Class LocalExecutionControlProvider
text: A provider of execution engines which run in the same process as JShell.
codes:
public class LocalExecutionControlProvider
extends Object
implements ExecutionControlProvider

methods.description: The unique name of this ExecutionControlProvider.

Create and return the default parameter map for
 LocalExecutionControlProvider.
 LocalExecutionControlProvider has no parameters.

methods.method_sig:
public ExecutionControl generate (ExecutionEnv env,
                                 Map<String, String> parameters)
methods.description: Create and return a locally executing ExecutionControl instance.
